person.persName: Thomas J. Almon (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and distiller )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and distiller. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Kirkwood Almon. Father of James S. Almon, A. A. Almon, Elizabeth C. Almon, Hugh D. Almon, Samuel W. Almon, Mary L. Almon, and C. L. Almon. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Hopkins County in 1850. Distiller in Hopkins County in 1860.
